data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Sal: I'm not sure what to order. What's ____ favorite ____ on ____ menu?
Waitress: Most ____ I ____ the ____ pasta ____. But I also ____ the ____ is ____.
Sal: The ____ does ____ good. But does it have much salt in it?
data.partBlankContent:
Sal: I'm not sure what to order. What's yo__ favorite th___ on t__ menu?
Waitress: Most da__ I li__ the che___ pasta di__. But I also th___ the chi____ is fant_____.
Sal: The chi____ does so___ good. But does it have much salt in it?
data.fullContent: Sal: I'm not sure what to order. What's your favorite thing on the menu? Waitress: Most days I like the cheese pasta dish. But I also think the chicken is fantastic. Sal: The chicken does sound good. But does it have much salt in it?
data.answer: 萨尔：我不知道要点什么。菜单上你最喜欢的是什么? 女服务员：大多数时候我喜欢奶酪通心粉。但我也觉得鸡肉很好吃。 萨尔：鸡肉听起来不错。但是里面有很多盐吗?
